summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated November 15, 2019, containing a draft press release for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding an incident. The subject line suggests it relates to Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email containing a draft press release from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Draft MCC Press Release Prepared
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney drafts a press release concerning the Metropolitan Correctional Center, likely in relation to Jeffrey Epstein's death.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY (U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York)
Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 15, 2019, concerning a draft press release for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The correspondence originates from an Assistant United States Attorney at the Southern District of New York's U.S. Attorney's Office.
The subject and context strongly suggest the press release relates to the death of Jeffrey Epstein, which occurred at the MCC in August 2019.
The document indicates official communication and press strategy by federal prosecutors following Epstein's death in custody.
